remarks: Alternate definition of the category of non-unital rings (in a universe).  (Contributed by AV, 16-Mar-2020.)
statement:
dfrngc2.c $e |- C = ( RngCat ` U ) $.
dfrngc2.u $e |- ( ph -> U e. V ) $.
dfrngc2.b $e |- ( ph -> B = ( U i^i Rng ) ) $.
dfrngc2.h $e |- ( ph -> H = ( RngHomo |` ( B X. B ) ) ) $.
dfrngc2.o $e |- ( ph -> .x. = ( comp ` ( ExtStrCat ` U ) ) ) $.
dfrngc2 $p |- ( ph -> C = { <. ( Base ` ndx ) , B >. , <. ( Hom ` ndx ) , H >. , <. ( comp ` ndx ) , .x. >. } ) $.
